blocks.heading: Shuai Qi
blocks.body:
Shuai Qi

Piano Accompanist

Shuai Qi is a 26-year-old Chinese piano accompanist, currently living in London, UK. She is currently studying in the second year of MA piano accompaniment at The Royal Academy of Music, under the tutelage of Michael Dussek . Shuai has a keen interest in piano accompaniment, especially passionate about Instrumental compositions from the classical period to the romantic period. Therefore, she has accumulated a lot of string accompaniment experience.she mastered the excellent skill of playing technique and musicality ,and can be very useful in accompaniment for soloists.

as an Exuberant musician , shuai is the official piano accompanist of China Youth Music Competition Humming Bird Music Awards , Dragonfly International Music Festival, Tianjin Violin and Viola competitions etc.In 2019, she was nominated for the Outstanding Instructor Award in many piano competitions. Many soloist who have worked with her were admitted to the Central Conservatory of Music and the Central Conservatory of Music High School.

Shuai has studied with professor Chen yun xian, a piano educator and recipient of special allowances from the State Council, and with professor Huang Mengmeng (Central Conservatory of Music), specializing in piano accompaniment. She graduated from Tianjin Conservatory of Music with a bachelor's degree. Shuai also had the honor to participate in the piano master class held by the Warsaw Conservatory of Music in Poland, and the Zhuhai String Master Class. she received the individual guidance from experienced performer and teacher professor Michael Dussek ,who is The Piano Accompaniment Department of the Royal Academy Of Music ,and professor Ulrich Koella ,who is The Piano And Chamber Department of the Zurich University of the Arts.

As an outstanding pianist and piano accompanist, Shuai enjoys performing in a wide range of repertoires in China , such as National Grand Theater, Tianjin Grand Theater, Beijing Tianqiao Art Center, etc. she has won the second prize of the Hummingbird Music Award in the professional group; the second prize of the "Little Golden Bell Award".

Shuai is also an excellent piano teacher, Teaching for more than ten years,her students have passed the Central Conservatory of Music piano exams and the ABRSM exams with Excellent grades. In addition, her student has achieved excellent results in piano competitions such as the 3rd Liszt International Youth Piano Competition and the China-Singapore International Music Competition. She is recognized as very patient and experienced teacher from every Patriarch .

Next, Shuai will continue to study piano accompaniment at the Royal Academy of Music. She will get more performance opportunities and accumulate more accompaniment repertoires, accumulating more experience for her future career.
